name: Arrow Pain
description:
Controls :

W, A, S, D - to move the player

Mouse - to look around

Left Click - to shoot the crossbow

Right Click - to place a decoy where the monsters will follow for a few seconds

Created By :

Jason Yap (Quan Hui Yap)
